entries.name: 年齡
entries: 阿蘭寇拉鷹人3歲時成年。相較於人類，阿蘭寇拉鷹人通常活不過30歲。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 阿蘭寇拉鷹人大多善良，且鮮少在守序或混亂中選擇立場。部族中的領袖與武者可能屬於守序，而探險者與冒險者則可能傾向混亂。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 阿蘭寇拉鷹人大約5呎高。他們有著體重介於80到100磅之間，纖細而輕盈的身體。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 飛行
entries: 你擁有50呎的飛行速度。要使用此移動速度，你不能穿著中甲或重甲。

entries.name: 禽爪
entries: 你熟練於你的徒手打擊，並在命中時造成1d4劈砍傷害。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你可以說、讀、寫通用語、阿蘭寇拉語、和風族語。

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 元素裔以和人類差不多的速度成熟，並在十多歲左右成人。他們活得比人類更久一點，最多到120歲。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 獨立而自信，元素裔傾向中立陣營。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 元素裔的體型和他們的凡人父母一樣各有不同，但其體格通常與人類相似，直立身高從5呎到6呎以上。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你可以說、讀、寫通用語以及原初語。原初語是一種喉音語言，充滿短促的音節和生硬的輔音。

entries.name: 無盡氣息
entries: 當你並未{@condition 無力}，你就可以無限期的屏住呼吸。

entries.name: 與風相混
entries: 你可以使用此特性施放一次{@spell 浮空術}，無需任何材料構材，且當你完成一次長休，你將重新獲得施放該法術的能力。你施展該法術的施法屬性為體質。

entries.name: 大地步行
entries: 你可以移動穿越由土或石構成的困難地形而不會消耗額外的移動速度。

entries.name: 與石交融
entries: 你可以使用此特性施放一次{@spell 行蹤無跡}，無需任何材料構材，且當你完成一次長休，你將重新獲得施放該法術的能力。你施展該法術的施法屬性為體質。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: 你在看距離你60呎範圍內的事物時，微光的照明程度對你而言視作明亮，黑暗則視作微光。你與火元素位面的聯系使你的黑暗視覺與眾不同：任何你在黑暗中所看到的事物都有著紅色的輪廓。

entries.name: 火焰抗性
entries: 你具有對火焰傷害的抗性。

entries.name: 觸及烈焰
entries: 你知曉{@spell 燃火術}戲法。當你升至3級，你可以使用此特性以一環法術施放一次{@spell 燃燒之手}，無需任何材料構材，且當你完成一次長休，你將重新獲得施放該法術的能力。你施展該法術的施法屬性為體質。

entries.name: 酸蝕抗性
entries: 你具有對酸蝕傷害的抗性。

entries.name: 兩棲
entries: 你可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

entries.name: 游泳
entries: 你擁有30呎的游泳速度。

entries.name: 呼喚波濤
entries: 你知曉{@spell 塑水|xge}戲法。當你升至3級，你可以使用此特性以二環法術施放一次{@spell 造水/枯水術}，且當你完成一次長休，你將重新獲得施放該法術的能力。你施展該法術的施法屬性為體質。

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 儘管精靈和人類會在差不多的年齡達到生理成熟，但精靈對成年的見解並不只是生理成熟，還包括世俗的經驗。精靈通常在100歲前後宣告成年並得到成年名稱，且其壽命可達750歲。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 精靈熱愛自由、多元、和自我表現，因此他們強烈傾向於較溫和的混亂。他們將他人的自由當作自己的來重視與保護。他們通常都是善良的。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 精靈的身高範圍從不到五呎到超過六呎，且有著苗條的體格。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: 習慣了微光森林與夜空，你在黑暗與微光環境下仍能保持卓越視覺。你在看距離你60呎範圍內的事物時，微光的照明程度對你而言視作明亮，黑暗則視作微光。 你無法辨別黑暗中的顏色，而只能看到灰黑的輪廓。

entries.name: 敏銳感官
entries: 你熟練於{@skill 感知}技能。

entries.name: 精類血統
entries: 你在對抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且魔法無法讓你入睡。

entries.name: 傳思
entries: 精靈並不需要睡眠。取而代之，他們一天會進行4小時保留潛意識的深度冥想。（通用語將這種冥想稱為"傳思"）在冥想時，你勉強算是會作夢；這些夢境實際上是在多年訓練下產生的反射性心靈鍛鍊。在以這種方式休息後，你得到與人類8小時睡眠後相同的益處。
{@note 如果你在長休期間冥想，你可以在花費4小時完成冥想後，在剩下的4小時中保持清醒，並進行輕省活動。你仍然需要花費8小時來完成長休。}

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語和精靈語。精靈語如流體般流暢，有著精妙的語調變化和複雜的語法結構。精靈文學豐富而多元，他們的詩歌在其他種族之間也很受歡迎。許多吟遊詩人都會學習精靈語，並將其韻律運用在他們自己的詩作中。

entries.name: 高級黑暗視覺
entries: 習慣了幽暗地域的深處，你在黑暗與微光環境下仍能保持卓越視覺。你在看距離你120呎範圍內的事物時，微光的照明程度對你而言視作明亮，黑暗則視作微光。你無法辨別黑暗中的顏色，而只能看到灰黑的輪廓。

entries.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當你、你的攻擊目標、或你嘗試感知的東西直接暴露在陽光下，則你依賴於視覺的攻擊檢定以及睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定具有劣勢。

entries.name: 卓爾魔法
entries: 你知曉{@spell 舞光術}戲法。當你升至3級，你每天可以施放一次{@spell 妖火術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你每天可以施放一次{@spell 黑暗術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展該法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: 卓爾武器訓練
entries: 你熟練於{@item 刺劍|phb}、{@item 短劍|phb}、和{@item 手弩|phb}。

entries.name: 精靈武器訓練
entries: 你熟練於{@item 長劍|phb}、{@item 短劍|phb}、{@item 短弓|phb}、和{@item 長弓|phb}。

entries.name: 妖精步
entries: 你可以使用此特性施放一次{@spell 迷蹤步}。當你完成一次短休或長休，你將重新獲得施放該法術的能力。

entries.name: 精靈武器訓練
entries: 你熟練於{@item 長劍|phb}、{@item 短劍|phb}、{@item 短弓|phb}、和{@item 長弓|phb}。

entries.name: 戲法
entries: 你知曉一個{@filter 從法師法術列表中自選的戲法|spells|level=0|class=Wizard}。你施展該法術的施法屬性為智力。

entries.name: 額外語言
entries: 你可以額外說、讀、寫一種你選擇的語言。

entries.name: 精靈武器訓練
entries: 你熟練於{@item 長劍|phb}、{@item 短劍|phb}、{@item 短弓|phb}、和{@item 長弓|phb}。

entries.name: 輕捷步伐
entries: 你的基礎步行速度提升到35呎。

entries.name: 荒野隱蔽
entries: 當你處於樹叢、大雨、落雪、霧氣或其他自然現象所造成的輕度遮蔽時，你可以嘗試進行躲藏。

entries.name: 妖精步
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你可以魔法性的傳送最多30呎距離到一處未被佔據的可見空間。一旦你使用此特性，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用它。

entries.name: 轉變季節
entries: 在每次短休或長休結束時，你可以使自己協律於一個季節的魔法，而跟正主宰你個性的季節無關。這麼做讓你得以施展一個特定戲法，如下列的轉變季節戲法表所示。當你使自己協律於一個季節的魔法，你將失去關聯於上一個季節的戲法，並獲得關聯於新季節的戲法。
你施展這些戲法的施法屬性為智力或魅力，看哪個較高。

entries.name: 額外語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫水族語。

entries.name: 飛行
entries: 你擁有30呎的飛行速度。要使用此移動速度，你不能穿著中甲或重甲。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫木族語、精靈語、和一個額外自選語言。精靈語如流體般流暢，有著精妙的語調變化和複雜的語法結構。精靈文學豐富而多元，他們的詩歌在其他種族之間也很受歡迎。許多吟遊詩人都會學習精靈語，並將其韻律運用在他們自己的詩作中。

entries.name: 野精靈武器訓練
entries: 你熟練於{@item 矛|phb}、{@item 短弓|phb}、{@item 長弓|phb}、和{@item 捕網|phb}。

entries.name: 戲法
entries: 你知曉一個{@filter 從德魯伊法術列表中自選的戲法|spells|level=0|class=Druid}。你施展該法術的施法屬性為睿知。

entries.name: 額外語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫水族語。

entries.name: 海精靈武器訓練
entries: 你熟練於{@item 矛|phb}、{@item 三叉戟|phb}、{@item 輕弩|phb}、和{@item 捕網|phb}。

entries.name: 海洋之子
entries: 你擁有30呎的游泳速度，且你可以在空氣與水中呼吸。

entries.name: 海洋之友
entries: 利用手勢與聲音，你可以和任何擁有天生游泳速度，體型為小型或更小的野獸溝通簡單的想法。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語、精靈語、和一個額外自選語言。精靈語如流體般流暢，有著精妙的語調變化和複雜的語法結構。精靈文學豐富而多元，他們的詩歌在其他種族之間也很受歡迎。許多吟遊詩人都會學習精靈語，並將其韻律運用在他們自己的詩作中。

entries.name: 戲法
entries: 你知曉下列其中一個戲法：{@spell 寒顫之觸}、{@spell 拯救瀕死}、或{@spell 奇術}。你施展該法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: 鴉后的祝福
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你可以魔法性的傳送最多15呎距離到一處未被佔據的可見空間，且直到你的下個回合開始，你獲得對所有傷害的抗性。在這段期間，你變得朦朧且半透明。一旦你使用這個能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用它。

subraces.name: 雅靈
entries: {@i 選擇你的雅靈季節：春、夏、秋或冬。當完成一次長休，一個雅靈將可以改變他的季節。參見"情報"頁以獲得更多資訊。}

entries.name: 妖精步
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你可以魔法性的傳送最多30呎距離到一處未被佔據的可見空間。一旦你使用此特性，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用它。
當你升至3級，你的妖精步將根據你的季節獲得一個額外效果；若該效果需要豁免，則DC等同8+你的熟練加值+你的魅力調整值：

items.name: 春
items.entry: 當你使用妖精步時，你可以觸碰一個距離你5呎內的自願生物。該生物將代替你被傳送，並出現在距離你30呎內的一處未被佔據的可見空間。

items.name: 夏
items.entry: 緊接在你使用妖精步後，距離你5呎內每個你所選擇的生物將受到等同於你魅力調整值的火焰傷害（最少1點）。

items.name: 秋
items.entry: 緊接在你使用妖精步後，距離你10呎內最多二個你所選擇的生物必須成功通過一次睿知豁免，否則被你{@condition 魅惑}1分鐘，或直到你或你的同伴對它造成傷害。

items.name: 冬
items.entry: 當你使用妖精步時，一個你所選擇在你傳送前距離你5呎內的可見生物必須成功通過一次睿知豁免，否則對你感到{@condition 恐懼}直到你的下個回合結束。

entries.name: 海精靈武器訓練
entries: 你熟練於{@item 矛|phb}、{@item 三叉戟|phb}、{@item 輕弩|phb}、和{@item 捕網|phb}。

entries.name: 海洋之子
entries: 你擁有30呎的游泳速度，且你可以在空氣與水中呼吸。

entries.name: 海洋之友
entries: 利用手勢與聲音，你可以和任何擁有天生游泳速度的野獸溝通簡單的想法。

entries.name: 額外語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫水族語。

entries.name: 死靈抗性
entries: 你具有對死靈傷害的抗性。

entries.name: 鴉后的祝福
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你可以魔法性的傳送最多30呎距離到一處未被佔據的可見空間。一旦你使用此特性，直到你完成一次長休之前都無法再使用它。
從3級開始，當你使用此特性傳送時，你也獲得對所有傷害的抗性。這個抗性持續到你的下個回合開始。在這段期間，你變得朦朧且半透明。

entries.name: 艾瑞尼熟練
entries: 艾瑞尼精靈可以選擇一個技能或工具熟練。當你使用所選熟練進行的任何檢定時，你的熟練加值視作兩倍。

entries.name: 戲法
entries: 你知曉一個{@filter 從法師法術列表中自選的戲法|spells|level=0|class=Wizard}。你施展該法術的施法屬性為智力。

entries.name: 額外語言
entries: 你可以額外說、讀、寫一種你選擇的語言。

entries.name: 維歐諾爾熟練
entries: 維歐諾爾精靈熟練於{@item 彎刀|phb}、{@item 雙刃彎刀|uawge|雙刃彎刀}、{@item 長弓|phb}、和{@item 短弓|phb}.

entries.name: 輕捷步伐.
entries: 你的基礎步行速度提升到35呎。

entries.name: 荒野隱蔽
entries: 當你處於樹叢、大雨、落雪、霧氣或其他自然現象所造成的輕度遮蔽時，你可以嘗試進行躲藏。

entries.name: 天生才能
entries: 你熟練於一種樂器或{@skill 表演}技能。

entries.name: 陰影恩賜
entries: 當你進行魅力（{@skill 表演}）或敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定時，你可以擲一顆d4直覺骰，並將骰出來的數字加到該屬性檢定中。

entries.name: 形塑陰影
entries: 你知曉{@spell 次級幻象}戲法。你施展該法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: 潛入陰影
entries: 你可以以一個附贈動作採取躲藏動作，即便你正被觀察或不在掩護中。無論你成功或失敗，一旦你使用這個能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前都無法再使用它。

entries: 你的基礎步行速度提升到35呎。

entries.name: 慕達雅魔法
entries: 你知曉{@spell 寒顫之觸}戲法。當你升至3級，你可以使用此特性施放一次{@spell 脆弱詛咒}並在完成一次長休之後重新獲得這麼做的能力。當你升至5級，你可以使用此特性施放一次{@spell 黑暗術}並在完成一次長休之後重新獲得這麼做的能力。你施展該法術的施法屬性為睿知。

entries.name: 高級黑暗視覺
entries: 你黑暗視覺的範圍變為120呎半徑。

entries.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當你、你的攻擊目標、或你嘗試感知的東西直接暴露在陽光下，則你依賴於視覺的攻擊檢定以及睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定具有劣勢。

entries.name: 精靈武器訓練
entries: 你熟練於{@item 長劍|phb}、{@item 短劍|phb}、{@item 短弓|phb}、和{@item 長弓|phb}。

entries.name: 多才多藝
entries: 你熟練於總共二種自選技能或工具。

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 儘管精靈和人類會在差不多的年齡達到生理成熟，但精靈對成年的見解並不只是生理成熟，還包括世俗的經驗。精靈通常在100歲前後宣告成年並得到成年名稱，且其壽命可達750歲。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 精靈熱愛自由、多元、和自我表現，因此他們強烈傾向於較溫和的混亂。他們將他人的自由當作自己的來重視與保護。他們通常都是善良的。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 精靈的身高範圍從不到五呎到超過六呎，且有著苗條的體格。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: 習慣了微光森林與夜空，你在黑暗與微光環境下仍能保持卓越視覺。你在看距離你60呎範圍內的事物時，微光的照明程度對你而言視作明亮，黑暗則視作微光。 你無法辨別黑暗中的顏色，而只能看到灰黑的輪廓。

entries.name: 敏銳感官
entries: 你熟練於{@skill 感知}技能。

entries.name: 精靈武器訓練
entries: 你熟練於{@item 長劍|phb}、{@item 短劍|phb}、{@item 短弓|phb}、和{@item 長弓|phb}。

entries.name: 精類血統
entries: 你在對抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且魔法無法讓你入睡。

entries.name: 傳思
entries: 精靈並不需要睡眠。取而代之，他們一天會進行4小時保留潛意識的深度冥想。（通用語將這種冥想稱為"傳思"）在冥想時，你勉強算是會作夢；這些夢境實際上是在多年訓練下產生的反射性心靈鍛鍊。在以這種方式休息後，你得到與人類8小時睡眠後相同的益處。
{@note 如果你在長休期間冥想，你可以在花費4小時完成冥想後，在剩下的4小時中保持清醒，並進行輕省活動。你仍然需要花費8小時來完成長休。}

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語和精靈語。精靈語如流體般流暢，有著精妙的語調變化和複雜的語法結構。精靈文學豐富而多元，他們的詩歌在其他種族之間也很受歡迎。許多吟遊詩人都會學習精靈語，並將其韻律運用在他們自己的詩作中。

entries.name: 輕捷步伐
entries: 你的基礎步行速度提升到35呎。

entries.name: 荒野隱蔽
entries: 當你處於樹叢、大雨、落雪、霧氣或其他自然現象所造成的輕度遮蔽時，你可以嘗試進行躲藏。

entries.name: 戲法
entries: 你知曉一個{@filter 從德魯伊法術列表中自選的戲法|spells|level=0|class=Druid}。你施展該法術的施法屬性為睿知。

entries.name: 額外語言
entries: 你可以額外說、讀、寫一種你選擇的語言。

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 地侏的成熟速度和人類相同，且大部分會被預計在40歲左右安定下來進入成年的生活。他們可以活到350歲到接近500歲。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 地侏大部分都是善良的。那些賢者、工程師、研究者、學者、調查者、或發明家傾向於守序，而那些吟游詩人、騙徒、流浪漢、或是富幻想的珠寶匠則傾向於混亂。地侏的心地善良，甚至他們之中的那些騙徒也多是玩笑性質，而不是真正帶有惡意。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 地侏的身高範圍在3呎到4呎之間，且平均約40磅重。你的體型為小型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: 習慣了地底的生活，你在黑暗與微光環境下仍能保持卓越視覺。你在看距離你60呎範圍內的事物時，微光的照明程度對你而言視作明亮，黑暗則視作微光。 你無法辨別黑暗中的顏色，而只能看到灰黑的輪廓。

entries.name: 地侏狡黠
entries: 你在所有對抗魔法的智力、睿知、和魅力豁免中具有優勢。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語和地侏語。地侏語是一種使用矮人文字的語言，並以其技術論文和對自然世界的知識分類而聞名。

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 地底地侏相比其他地侏而言是短命的。他們的成熟速度和人類相同，且會在25歲時被視作成年。他們的壽命可達200到250歲，儘管幽暗地域中的艱苦勞動和危險經常在他們迎來大限之前就奪走他們的性命。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 斯奈布力認為生存的關鍵取決於避免與其他生物牽連並避免樹敵，因此他們偏好中立陣營。他們很少希望別人倒楣，且除了他們最親近的人之外，他們也不太會為了其他人而冒險。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 一個典型斯奈布力的身高大約為3到3½呎高，且體重為80到120磅。你的體型為小型。

entries.name: 高級黑暗視覺
entries: 習慣了地底的生活，你在黑暗與微光環境下仍能保持卓越視覺。你在看距離你120呎範圍內的事物時，微光的照明程度對你而言視作明亮，黑暗則視作微光。你無法辨別黑暗中的顏色，而只能看到灰黑的輪廓。

entries.name: 岩地偽裝
entries: 你在岩石地形為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語、地侏語、和地底通用語。斯奈布力方言比地表所使用的地侏語有著更多喉音字，且大部分的斯奈布力們只知道一點點通用語。但那些常與外來者打交道的傢伙（包括做為冒險者的你）則學會了足夠多的通用語以在其他地區也能勉強生活。

entries.name: 天生幻術
entries: 你知曉{@spell 次級幻象}戲法。你施展該法術的施法屬性為智力。

entries.name: 小型野獸溝通
entries: 透過聲音和手勢，你可以和體型為小型或更小的野獸交流簡單的想法。林地侏喜愛動物，且經常飼養松鼠、獾、兔子、鼴鼠、啄木鳥、或其他生物做為他們心愛的寵物。

entries.name: 巧匠學識
entries: 每當你進行與魔法物品、煉金物體、或科技裝置有關的智力（{@skill 歷史}）檢定時，你可以加入你兩倍的熟練加值以取代任何你原有的熟練加值。

entries.name: 修補匠
entries: 你熟練於工匠工具({@item 修補匠工具|phb})。藉由使用這些工具，你可以花費1小時的時間以及價值10金幣的材料以創造出一個微型的發條裝置（AC 5，1點生命值）。這個裝置將在24小時之後停止運轉（除非你花費1小時修理它以維持裝置的功能），或直到你使用你的動作將它拆卸；在這個時候，你可以取回你用於創造它的材料。你同時可以有最多三個正在運作的這類裝置。
當你創造一個裝置時，選擇下列其中一個選項：

entries.name: 發條玩具
entries: 這個玩具是一個發條動物、怪物、或小人，像是青蛙、老鼠、小鳥、龍、或是士兵。當被擺放在地上，這個玩具將會在你的每個回合內沿著地面向隨機方向移動5呎。它會發出與其生物外型相符的聲音。

entries.name: 打火機
entries: 這個裝置會產生出微小的火焰，你可以用以點燃蠟燭、火炬、或是篝火。使用這個裝置需要一個動作。

entries.name: 音樂盒
entries: 當打開時，這個音樂盒將會以適中的音量演奏一首歌曲。這個音樂箱會在歌曲結束或被關上時停止演奏。

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 地底地侏相比其他地侏而言是短命的。他們的成熟速度和人類相同，且會在25歲時被視作成年。他們的壽命可達200到250歲，儘管幽暗地域中的艱苦勞動和危險經常在他們迎來大限之前就奪走他們的性命。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 不像其他地侏，斯奈布力的體重通常在80到120磅之間。你的體型為小型。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 斯奈布力認為，生存的關鍵取決於避免與其他生物牽連並避免樹敵，因此他們偏好中立陣營。他們很少希望別人倒楣，且除了他們最親近的人之外，他們也不太會為了其他人而冒險。

entries.name: 高級黑暗視覺
entries: 習慣了地底的生活，你在黑暗與微光環境下仍能保持卓越視覺。你在看距離你120呎範圍內的事物時，微光的照明程度對你而言視作明亮，黑暗則視作微光。你無法辨別黑暗中的顏色，而只能看到灰黑的輪廓。

entries.name: 岩地偽裝
entries: 你在岩石地形為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語、地侏語、和地底通用語。

entries.name: Gifted Scribe
entries: You are proficient with {@item calligrapher's supplies|phb} and {@item forgery kit|phb|forgery kits}. When you make an ability check using either one of these tools, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Scribe's Insight
entries: You can cast {@spell comprehend languages} once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Whispering Wind
entries: You know the cantrip {@spell message}. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability when casting it.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 年幼的龍裔成長速度很快。他們在孵化後幾個小時後就會步行，在3歲的時候就達到人類10歲孩童的體型和發育程度，並在15歲時成年。他們可以活到大約80歲。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 龍裔的陣營趨向極端，在善與惡的無盡戰爭中（各自代表巴哈姆特和提亞瑪特）有意識的選擇加入其中一邊。大部分的龍裔是善良的，但那些選擇站在提亞瑪特那一邊的龍裔則會是可怕的惡棍。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 龍裔比人類更高更重，他們在站立時遠超過6呎高，且有著平均250磅的體重。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 龍族血統
entries: 你擁有龍族的血統。從龍族血統表中選擇一個龍種。你的噴吐武器和傷害抗性將會由你所選的龍種而決定，如表所示。

entries.name: 噴吐武器
entries: 你可以使用你的動作以呼出毀滅性的能量。你的龍族血統決定了這個吐息的尺寸、形狀、以及傷害類型。
當你使用你的噴吐武器時，每個在吐息範圍內的生物都必須進行一次豁免檢定，其豁免屬行由你的龍族血統決定。這個豁免檢定的DC等同於8+你的體質調整值+你的熟練加值。一個豁免失敗的生物將受到{@dice 2d6}傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。這個傷害將在你的等級升至6級時增加至{@dice 3d6}，11級時{@dice 4d6}，以及16級時{@dice 5d6}。
在你使用你的噴吐武器之後，直到完成一次短休或長休之前，你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 傷害抗性
entries: 你具有與你龍族血統相應傷害類型的抗性。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語和龍語。龍語被認為是最古老的語言之一，且在魔法研究中經常被使用。龍語對大部分其他生物而言聽起來非常刺耳，而且包含了很多硬輔音和噝聲擦音。

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Goliaths have lifespans comparable to humans. They enter adulthood in their late teens and usually live less than a century.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Goliath society, with its clear roles and tasks, has a strong lawful bent. The goliath sense of fairness, balanced with an emphasis on self sufficiency and personal accountability, pushes them toward neutrality.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Goliaths are between 7 and 8 feet tall and weigh between 280 and 340 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Natural Athlete
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Athletics} skill.

entries.name: Stone's Endurance
entries: You can focus yourself to occasionally shrug off injury. When you take damage, you can use your reaction to roll a d12. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled, and reduce the damage by that total. After you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Mountain Born
entries: You're acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet. You're also naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語和巨人語。

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 半精靈的成熟速度和人類相同，並在20歲左右成年。然而，他們的壽命遠長於人類，經常能活超過180歲。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 半精靈分享了來自他們精靈血統的混亂天性。他們重視個人自由和創造性表達，既不展現出對領導者的喜愛、也不渴望受人追隨。他們厭惡規則、討厭被別人命令、且有時會顯得不太可靠——或至少難以預測。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 半精靈有著和人類相近的體型，身高介於5呎至6呎之間。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: 多虧於你的精靈血統，你在黑暗與微光環境下仍能保持卓越視覺。你在看距離你60呎範圍內的事物時，微光的照明程度對你而言視作明亮，黑暗則視作微光。你無法辨別黑暗中的顏色，而只能看到灰黑的輪廓。

entries.name: 精類血統
entries: 你在對抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且魔法無法讓你入睡。

entries.name: 多才多藝
entries: 你熟練於二個你所選擇的技能。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語、精靈語、和另一種你所選擇的語言。

entries.name: 多才多藝
entries: 你熟練於二個你所選擇的技能。

entries.name: 敏銳感官
entries: 你熟練於{@skill 感知}技能。

entries.name: 精靈武器訓練
entries: 你熟練於{@item 長劍|phb}、{@item 短劍|phb}、{@item 短弓|phb}、和{@item 長弓|phb}。

entries.name: 輕捷步伐
entries: 你的基礎步行速度提升到35呎。

entries.name: 荒野隱蔽
entries: 當你處於樹叢、大雨、落雪、霧氣或其他自然現象所造成的輕度遮蔽時，你可以嘗試進行躲藏。

subraces.name: 月精靈或日精靈血統
subraces.ENG_name: Moon Elf or Sun Elf Descent

entries.name: 多才多藝
entries: 你熟練於二個你所選擇的技能。

entries.name: 敏銳感官
entries: 你熟練於{@skill 感知}技能。

entries.name: 精靈武器訓練
entries: 你熟練於{@item 長劍|phb}、{@item 短劍|phb}、{@item 短弓|phb}、和{@item 長弓|phb}。

entries.name: 戲法
entries: 你知曉一個{@filter 從法師法術列表中自選的戲法|spells|level=0|class=Wizard}。你施展該法術的施法屬性為智力。

entries.name: 多才多藝
entries: 你熟練於二個你所選擇的技能。

entries.name: 敏銳感官
entries: 你熟練於{@skill 感知}技能。

entries.name: 卓爾魔法
entries: 你知曉{@spell 舞光術}戲法。當你升至3級，你每天可以施放一次{@spell 妖火術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你每天可以施放一次{@spell 黑暗術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: 多才多藝
entries: 你熟練於二個你所選擇的技能。

entries.name: 敏銳感官
entries: 你熟練於{@skill 感知}技能。

entries.name: 游泳
entries: 你獲得30呎的游泳速度。

entries.name: 演繹直覺
entries: 當你進行智力（{@skill 調查}）檢定或睿知（{@skill 察言觀色}）檢定時，你可以骰一顆d4的直覺骰，並將骰出來的數字加入該屬性檢定中。

entries.name: 感知威脅
entries: 你可以施放{@spell 偵測魔法}和{@spell 偵測毒素或疾病}法術，但只能透過儀式施展。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為智力。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語和精靈語。

entries.name: 海猿
entries: 你的基礎步行速度為30呎，且你擁有30呎的游泳速度。

entries.name: 領風直覺
entries: 當你進行敏捷（{@skill 特技}）檢定或任何涉及操作或維修水上或空中載具的屬性檢定時，你可以骰一顆d4的直覺骰，並將骰出來的數字加入該屬性檢定中。

entries.name: 暴風祝福
entries: 你擁有對閃電傷害的抗性。

entries.name: 迎風之手
entries: 你知曉{@spell 舞風|xge}戲法。當你升至3級，你每天可以施放一次{@spell 造風術}，並在你完成一次長休之後才能恢復使用此特性施放該法術的能力。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語和精靈語。

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 半獸人的成熟速度比人類略快一些，並在14歲左右便成年。他們的衰老速度明顯更快，且很少能活超過75歲。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 半獸人從他們的獸人親代繼承了容易傾向於混亂的血統，且因此不會有善良陣營的強烈傾向。在獸人中成長並願意在其中生活的半獸人通常是邪惡的。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 半獸人比人類更大而魁梧，他們的身高範圍從不到5呎到遠超過6呎都有。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: 多虧於你的獸人血統，你在黑暗與微光環境下仍能保持卓越視覺。你在看距離你60呎範圍內的事物時，微光的照明程度對你而言視作明亮，黑暗則視作微光。你無法辨別黑暗中的顏色，而只能看到灰黑的輪廓。

entries.name: 兇惡
entries: 你熟練於{@skill 威嚇}技能。

entries.name: 頑強耐性
entries: 當你的生命值被歸零但沒有當場被殺死時，你可以改為使生命值減少至1。直到完成一次長休之前，你都不能再使用這個特性。

entries.name: 野蠻攻擊
entries: 當你以一次近戰武器攻擊造成重擊時，你可以額外骰一次該武器的其中一顆傷害骰，並將之加入重擊的額外傷害中。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你可以說、讀、寫通用語和獸人語。獸人語是一種使用硬輔音的粗糙、刺耳的語言。它沒有自己的文字，而是使用矮人文字進行書寫。

entries.name: 獵人直覺
entries: 你的龍紋使你的感官更加鋒銳，並協助你找尋你的獵物。當你進行一次睿知（{@skill 感知}）或睿知（{@skill 求生}）檢定時，你可以骰一顆d4的直覺骰，並將骰出來的數字加入該屬性檢定中。

entries.name: 銘印獵物
entries: 以一個附贈動作，選擇一個距離你30呎內且你所能看見的生物。目標將被銘記在你心中直到它死亡或你再次使用此特性。或者，每當你成功通過一次睿知（{@skill 求生}）檢定以追蹤一個生物時，你可以將它銘記做為你的獵物。當追蹤你的獵物時，將你直覺骰的擲骰結果變為二倍。當你的獵物距離你60呎內，你將能察覺它的位置：它無法躲藏於你、對你獲得{@condition 隱形}的好處、且你對它進行的攻擊將忽略半掩護。一旦你使用此特性，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 自然之音
entries: 當你升至3級時，你獲得施放{@spell 動植物定位術}的能力，但只能透過儀式施展。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語和哥布林語。

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 矮人的成熟速度和人類相同，但他們直到50歲之前都會被視作未成年。他們平均可以活大約350年。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 大部分的矮人是守序的，堅信著井然有序的社會所帶來的好處。他們也傾向善良，有著強烈的公平競爭意識，並認為每個人都應該共享公正秩序的益處。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 矮人的身高介於4到5呎高，且平均大約150磅重。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 移動速度
entries: 你的移動速度並不會因為穿著重甲而減少。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: 習慣了地底的生活，你在黑暗與微光環境下仍能保持卓越視覺。你在看距離你60呎範圍內的事物時，微光的照明程度對你而言視作明亮，黑暗則視作微光。 你無法辨別黑暗中的顏色，而只能看到灰黑的輪廓。

entries.name: 矮人韌性
entries: 你在對抗毒素的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且你對毒素傷害具有抗性。

entries.name: 矮人戰鬥訓練
entries: 你熟練於{@item 戰斧|phb}、{@item 手斧|phb}、{@item 輕錘|phb}、和{@item 戰錘|phb}。

entries.name: 工具熟練
entries: 你熟練於下列其中一個你所選擇的工匠工具：{@item 鐵匠工具|phb}、{@item 釀酒師設備|phb}、或{@item 石匠工具|phb}。

entries.name: 岩石熟悉
entries: 每當你進行關聯於石製品起源的智力（{@skill 歷史}）檢定時，你被視為熟練於{@skill 歷史}技能，並將你二倍的熟練加值代替你原本的熟練加值加入該檢定中。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語和矮人語。矮人語充斥了堅硬的輔音和喉音，而這些特徵也將顯露在任何矮人可能會說的其他語言中。

entries.name: 矮人耐力
entries: 你的生命值最大值增加1點，且在每次你提升等級時再增加1點。

entries.name: 矮人護甲訓練
entries: 你熟練於輕甲和中甲。

entries.name: 高級黑暗視覺
entries: 習慣了地底的生活，你在黑暗與微光環境下仍能保持卓越視覺。你在看距離你120呎範圍內的事物時，微光的照明程度對你而言視作明亮，黑暗則視作微光。你無法辨別黑暗中的顏色，而只能看到灰黑的輪廓。

entries.name: 灰矮人韌性
entries: 你在對抗毒素的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且你對毒素傷害具有抗性。你也在對抗幻術以及對抗{@condition 魅惑}或{@condition 麻痺}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語、矮人語、和地底通用語。

entries.name: 灰矮人魔法
entries: 當你升至3級，你每天可以使用此特性對你自己施放一次{@spell 變巨/縮小術}，但只能使用變巨的選項。當你升至5級，你每天可以使用此特性對你自己施放一次{@spell 隱形術}。你不需要為這些法術提供材料構材，且你不能在自己暴露於陽光下時施放它們，儘管一旦施放後，陽光對它們不會有任何影響。你在完成一次長休後才能恢復再次使用此特性施放這些法術的能力。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為智力。

entries.name: 日光敏感
entries: 當你、你的攻擊目標、或你嘗試感知的東西直接暴露在陽光下，則你依賴於視覺的攻擊檢定以及睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定具有劣勢。

entries.name: Master of Locks
entries: When you make an Intelligence ({@skill History}), Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}), or {@item Thieves' tools|phb} check involving lock and trap mechanisms, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Wards and Seals
entries: You can use your mark to cast the {@spell alarm} spell as a ritual. Starting at 3rd level you can cast {@spell arcane lock} once with this trait and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 人類在近二十歲時成年，且可活不到一世紀。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 人類並不傾向特定陣營。你可以在他們之中找到最好以及最壞的個體。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 人類身高體格之間的差距很大，從勉強5呎高到遠超過6呎都有。不論你在這範圍內的位置為何，你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你可以說、讀、寫通用語和另一種你所選擇的語言。人類通常會學習那些與他們打交道的其他族類的語言，包括那些晦澀難解的方言。他們喜歡借用來自其他方言的字詞去點綴他們的言詞，像是獸人的咒罵、精靈音樂般的措辭、矮人的軍事片語、諸如此類。

entries.name: 技能
entries: 你熟練於一個你所選擇的技能。

entries.name: 專長
entries: 你獲得一個你所選擇的專長。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Hunter's Intuition
entries: Your mark sharpens your senses and helps you find your prey. When you make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) or Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) check, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Imprint Prey
entries: As a bonus action, choose one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The target is imprinted in your mind until it dies or you use this trait again. Alternatively, you can imprint a creature as your quarry whenever you succeed on a Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) check to track it. When tracking your quarry, double the result of your Intuition die. When your quarry is within 60 feet of you, you have a sense of its location: it can't be hidden from you, gains no benefit from invisibility, and your attacks against it ignore half cover. Once you use this trait, you cannot use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Nature's Voice
entries: When you reach 3rd level you gain the ability to cast {@spell locate animals or plants}, but only as a ritual.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: Wild Intuition
entries: When you make a Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling}) or Intelligence ({@skill Nature}) check, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Expert Handling
entries: You can use the Help action to aid an ally animal companion or mount within 30 feet of you, rather than 5 feet of you.

entries.name: Primal Connection
entries: You can cast {@spell animal friendship} once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

entries.name: The Bigger They Are
entries: When you cast a spell that affects only beasts, it also affects monstrosities with an Intelligence score of 3 or lower.

entries.name: Artisan's Intuition
entries: When you make an ability check with artisan's tools, roll 1d4 and add it to the result.

entries.name: Maker's Gift
entries: You know the cantrip {@spell mending} and gain proficiency with one type of artisan's tools.

entries.name: Magecraft
entries: You can create a temporary magic item out of common materials. Choose a cantrip from the {@filter wizard spell list|spells|class=wizard|level=0}. Describe the item connected to it. As long as you possess the item, you know that cantrip. At the end of a long rest, you can replace it with a new item and select a new cantrip from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these cantrips.

entries.name: Spellsmith
entries: You can spend one minute to weave a temporary enchantment into a nonmagical suit of armor or weapon. For the next hour the object becomes a magic item, gaining a +1 bonus to AC if it is armor or a +1 bonus to hit and damage if it is a weapon. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Courier's Speed
entries: Your base walking speed increases to 40 ft.

entries.name: Intuitive Motion
entries: When you make a Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check or any ability check to operate or maintain a land vehicle, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Determined Stride
entries: When you use the {@action Dash} action, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement on that turn.

entries.name: Shared Passage
entries: As a bonus action you can teleport a distance up to your walking speed, ending in an unoccupied space that you can see. You can bring one willing creature of your size or smaller who is carrying gear up to its carrying capacity. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you use this trait. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Sentinel's Intuition
entries: When you roll for Initiative or make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check to notice a threat, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add it to the ability check.

entries.name: Sentinel's Shield
entries: You know the cantrip {@spell blade ward}. You can cast {@spell shield} once with this trait and regain the ability to do so after you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Vigilant Guardian
entries: As an action, you can designate an ally you can see as your ward. You have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks made to spot threats to your ward. In addition, when you are within 5 feet of your ward, and that creature is the target of an attack that you can see, you can use your reaction to swap places with your ward. When you do, you become the target of the attack.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Keldons reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Keldons tend toward chaotic alignments, and many walk a fine line between good and evil.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Keldons are taller and heavier than the human norms of other cultures, standing almost universally above 6 feet tall and reaching heights above 7 feet. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Keldon.

entries.name: Natural Athlete
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Athletics} skill.

entries.name: Keldon Resilience
entries: You have proficiency in Strength saving throws.

entries.name: Icehaven Born
entries: You are naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the {@i Dungeon Master's Guide}.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 半身人在20歲時成年，且通常可以活到150歲。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 大部分的半身人都是守序善良。一般來說，他們心地善良、和藹可親，厭惡看見他人受苦，且完全不能容忍壓迫。他們也很守秩序、助重傳統、無比倚重他們社群的支持以及老套生活所帶來的舒適。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 半身人平均大約3呎高，且體重約莫40磅。你的體型為小型。

entries.name: 幸運
entries: 當你在攻擊檢定、屬性檢定、或豁免檢定中骰出了1，你可以重骰該檢定且必須使用新的擲骰結果。

entries.name: 勇敢
entries: 你在對抗{@condition 恐懼}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

entries.name: 半身人靈巧
entries: 你可以移動穿過任何體型大於你的生物所在的空間。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能夠說、讀、寫通用語和半身人語。半身人的語言並不是秘密，但他們並不怎麼情願與他人分享它。他們很少書寫，因此並沒有豐富的文學作品。然而，他們的口說傳統相當強勢。幾乎所有半身人都會說通用語，以跟他所居住或旅經地區的人們交談。

entries.name: 天生善匿
entries: 即使當你只處於體型至少大你一級的生物所造成的遮蔽後，你也可以嘗試進行躲藏。

entries.name: 強魄韌性
entries: 你在對抗毒素的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且你對毒素傷害具有抗性。

entries.name: 無聲傳話
entries: 你可以透過心靈感應向任何一個距離你30呎內的生物說話。該生物必須和你之間有共通語言才能理解你的意思。你同時只能以這個方式對一個生物透過心靈感應傳話。

entries.name: 醫藥直覺
entries: 當你進行睿知（{@skill 醫藥}）檢定時，你可以骰一顆d4的直覺骰，並將骰出來的數字加入該屬性檢定中

entries.name: 治療之觸
entries: 以一個動作，你可以從你的龍紋汲取能量以消耗你的其中一個生命骰，並使自己或一個你所觸碰的生物恢復活力。骰你的生命骰，並加上你的睿知調整值，該生物將回復等同於其總合的生命值。一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 客棧老闆的魅力
entries: 你知曉{@spell 交友術}和{@spell 魔法技倆}戲法。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: 常保殷勤
entries: 當你進行魅力（{@skill 說服}）檢定或任何涉及{@item 釀酒師設備|phb}或{@item 廚師炊具|phb}的屬性檢定時，你可以骰一顆d4的直覺骰，並將骰出來的數字加入該屬性檢定中。

entries.name: 體型
entries: Shifters are about the same size as humans. Your size is Medium

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: Your lycanthropic heritage grants you the ability to see in dark conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Shifting
entries: On your turn, you can shift as a bonus action. Shifting lasts for 1 minute or until you end it on your turn as a bonus action.
While shifting, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution bonus (minimum of 1). You also gain a feature that depends on your shifter subrace, described below.
You must finish a short or long rest before you can shift again.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you can make an unarmed strike as a bonus action. You can use your Dexterity for its attack roll and damage bonus, and this attack deals slashing damage.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you gain advantage on all Wisdom-based checks and saving throws.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you gain a climb speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you can use the {@action Dash} action as a bonus action.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you can make a bite attack as an action. This is a melee weapon attack that uses Strength for its attack roll and damage bonus and deals 1d6 piercing damage. If this attack hits a target that is your size or smaller, the target is also {@condition grappled}.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: 提夫林的成熟速度和人類相同，但可以比人類多活個幾年。

entries.name: 陣營
entries: 提夫林也許並沒有傾向邪惡的天性，但他們之中許多最終都步向邪惡。無論邪惡與否，他們獨立的天性使許多提夫林都偏向了混亂陣營。

entries.name: 體型
entries: 提夫林的身材和體型與人類大致相同。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: 多虧於你的煉獄血脈，你在黑暗與微光環境下仍能保持卓越視覺。你在看距離你60呎範圍內的事物時，微光的照明程度對你而言視作明亮，黑暗則視作微光。你無法辨別黑暗中的顏色，而只能看到灰黑的輪廓。

entries.name: 煉獄抗性
entries: 你具有對火焰傷害的抗性。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你可以說、讀、寫通用語和煉獄語。

entries.name: 煉獄傳承
entries: 你知曉{@spell 奇術}戲法。當你升至3級，你能夠以2環法術施放一次{@spell 煉獄叱喝}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 黑暗術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: 外貌
entries: 你的提夫林看起來或許和其他提夫林不太一樣。取代《玩家手冊》中描述的身體特徵，你從下列選項中選擇{@dice 1d4+1}項特徵：小型犄角、獠牙或尖銳的牙齒、分叉的舌頭、貓瞳、每隻手有六根手指、山羊腿、偶蹄、分叉的尾巴、革質或帶鱗的皮膚、紅色或深藍色的皮膚、不會產生影子或映像、發散出硫磺般的氣味。

entries.name: 煉獄傳承 (PHB)
entries: 你知曉{@spell 奇術}戲法。當你升至3級，你能夠以2環法術施放一次{@spell 煉獄叱喝}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 黑暗術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: 魔鬼之舌
entries: 你知曉{@spell 惡毒嘲笑}戲法。當你升至3級，你能夠以2環法術施放一次{@spell 魅惑人類}。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 注目術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放這些法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。這個特性取代煉獄傳承特性。

entries.name: 地獄之火
entries: 你知曉{@spell 奇術}戲法。當你升至3級，你每天能夠以2環法術施放一次{@spell 燃燒之手}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 黑暗術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: 飛翼
entries: 你擁有一對從肩胛骨長出的蝙蝠翅膀。當你未穿戴重甲時，你擁有30呎的飛行速度。

entries.name: Abyssal Arcana
entries: Each time you finish a long rest, you gain the ability to cast cantrips and spells randomly determined from a short list. At 1st level, you can cast a cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can also cast a 1st-level spell. At 5th level, you can cast a 2nd-level spell.

You can cast a spell gained from this trait only once until you complete your next long rest. You can cast a cantrip gained from this trait at will, as normal. For 1st-level spells whose effect changes if cast using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you cast the spell as if using a 2nd-level slot. Spells of 2nd level are cast as if using a 2nd-level slot

At the end of each long rest, you lose the cantrips and spells previously granted by this feature, even if you did not cast them. You replace those cantrips and spells by rolling for new ones on the Abyssal Arcana Spells table. Roll separately for each cantrip and spell. If you roll the same spell or cantrip you gained at the end of your previous long rest, roll again until you get a different result.

entries.name: Abyssal Fortitude
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by half your level (minimum 1).

entries.name: 語言
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Abyssal.

entries.name: Infernal Legacy
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell hellish rebuke} spell as a 2nd-level spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Once you reach 5th level, you can also cast the {@spell darkness} spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Maladomini
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell ray of sickness} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell crown of madness} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Dis
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell disguise self} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell invisibility} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Phlegethos
entries: You know the {@spell friends} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell charm person} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell suggestion} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Malbolge
entries: You know the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell disguise self} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell invisibility} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Stygia
entries: You know the {@spell ray of frost} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell armor of Agathys} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell darkness} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Minauros
entries: You know the {@spell mage hand} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell Tenser's floating disk} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell arcane lock} spell once with this trait, requiring no material component, and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Cania
entries: You know the {@spell mage hand} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell magic missile} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell web} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Avernus
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell searing smite} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell branding smite} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: 煉獄傳承
entries: 你知曉{@spell 奇術}戲法。當你升至3級，你能夠以2環法術施放一次{@spell 煉獄叱喝}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 黑暗術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: Legacy of Maladomini
entries: 你知曉{@spell 奇術}戲法。當你升至3級，你能夠以2環法術施放一次{@spell 致病射線}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 瘋狂冠冕}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: Legacy of Dis
entries: 你知曉{@spell 奇術}戲法。當你升至3級，你可以施放一次{@spell 易容術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 偵測思想}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: Legacy of Phlegethos
entries: 你知曉{@spell 交友術}戲法。當你升至3級，你能夠以2環法術施放一次{@spell 魅惑人類}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 暗示術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: Legacy of Malbolge
entries: 你知曉{@spell 次級幻象}戲法。當你升至3級，你可以施放一次{@spell 易容術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 隱形術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: Legacy of Stygia
entries: 你知曉{@spell 冷凍射線}戲法。當你升至3級，你能夠以2環法術施放一次{@spell 艾嘉西斯之鎧}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 黑暗術}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: Legacy of Minauros
entries: 你知曉{@spell 法師之手}戲法。當你升至3級，你可以施放一次{@spell 譚森浮碟術}；你必須完成一次短休或長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 祕法鎖}，無須材料構材；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: Legacy of Cania
entries: 你知曉{@spell 法師之手}戲法。當你升至3級，你能夠以2環法術施放一次{@spell 燃燒之手}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 火焰刀}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: Legacy of Avernus
entries: 你知曉{@spell 奇術}戲法。當你升至3級，你能夠以2環法術施放一次{@spell 熾炎斬}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。當你升至5級，你可以施放一次{@spell 烙印斬}；你必須完成一次長休才能再次使用此特性施放該法術。你施展這些法術的施法屬性為魅力。

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Bugbears reach adulthood at age 16 and live up to 80 years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Bugbears endure a harsh existence that demands each of them to remain self-sufficient, even at the expense of their fellows. They tend to be chaotic evil.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Bugbears are between 6 and 8 feet tall and weigh between 250 and 350 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Long-Limbed
entries: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Sneaky
entries: You are proficient in the {@skill Stealth} skill.

entries.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Aasimar mature at the same rate as humans, but they can live up to 160 years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Imbued with celestial power, most aasimar are good. Outcast aasimar are most often neutral or even evil.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Aasimar have the same range of height and weight as humans.

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: Blessed with a radiant soul, your vision can easily cut through darkness. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Celestial Resistance
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage.

entries.name: Healing Hands
entries: As an action, you can touch a creature and cause it to regain a number of hit points equal to your level. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Light Bearer
entries: You know the {@spell light} cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Celestial.

entries.name: Necrotic Shroud
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing your eyes to turn into pools of darkness and two skeletal, ghostly, flightless wings to sprout from your back. The instant you transform, other creatures within 10 feet of you that can see you must succeed on a Charisma saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier) or become {@condition frightened} of you until the end of your next turn.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra necrotic damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra necrotic damage equals your level.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Radiant Soul
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing your eyes to glimmer and two luminous, incorporeal wings to sprout from your back.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you have a flying speed of 30 feet, and once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra radiant damage equals your level.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Radiant Consumption
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing a searing light to radiate from you, pour out of your eyes and mouth, and threaten to char you.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet, and at the end of each of your turns, you and each creature within 10 feet of you take radiant damage equal to half your level (rounded up). In addition, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra radiant damage equals your level.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: As humanoids related to the fey, firbolg have long lifespans. A firbolg reaches adulthood around 30, and the oldest of them can live for 500 years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: As people who follow the rhythm of nature and see themselves as its caretakers, firbolg are typically neutral good. Evil firbolg are rare and are usually the sworn enemies of the rest of their kind.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Firbolg are between 7 and 8 feet tall and weigh between 240 and 300 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Firbolg Magic
entries: You can cast {@spell detect magic} and {@spell disguise self} with this trait, using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability for them. Once you cast either spell, you can't cast it again with this trait until you finish a short or long rest. When you use this version of {@spell disguise self}, you can seem up to 3 feet shorter than normal, allowing you to more easily blend in with humans and elves.

entries.name: Hidden Step
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically turn {@condition invisible} until the start of your next turn or until you attack, make a damage roll, or force someone to make a saving throw. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Speech of Beast and Leaf
entries: You have the ability to communicate in a limited manner with beasts and plants. They can understand the meaning of your words, though you have no special ability to understand them in return. You have advantage on all Charisma checks you make to influence them.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Elvish, and Giant.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Goblins reach adulthood at age 8 and live up to 60 years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Goblins are typically neutral evil, as they care only for their own needs. A few goblins might tend toward good or neutrality, but only rarely.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Goblins are between 3 and 4 feet tall and weigh between 40 and 80 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Fury of the Small
entries: When you damage a creature with an attack or a spell and the creature's size is larger than yours, you can cause the attack or spell to deal extra damage to the creature. The extra damage equals your level. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Nimble Escape
entries: You can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Hobgoblins mature at the same rate as humans and have lifespans similar in length to theirs.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Hobgoblin society is built on fidelity to a rigid, unforgiving code of conduct. As such, they tend toward lawful evil.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Hobgoblins are between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh between 150 and 200 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Martial Training
entries: You are proficient with two martial weapons of your choice and with light armor.

entries.name: Saving Face
entries: Hobgoblins are careful not to show weakness in front of their allies, for fear of losing status. If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or a saving throw, you can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus of +5). Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Kenku have shorter lifespans than humans. They reach maturity at about 12 years old and can live to 60.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Kenku are chaotic creatures, rarely making enduring commitments, and they care mostly for preserving their own hides. They are generally chaotic neutral in outlook.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Kenku are around 5 feet tall and weigh between 90 and 120 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Expert Forgery
entries: You can duplicate other creatures' handwriting and craftwork. You have advantage on all checks made to produce forgeries or duplicates of existing objects.

entries.name: Kenku Training
entries: You are proficient in your choice of two of the following skills: {@skill Acrobatics}, {@skill Deception}, {@skill Stealth}, and {@skill Sleight of Hand}.

entries.name: Mimicry
entries: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom (Insight) check opposed by your Charisma (Deception) check.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can read and write Common and Auran, but you can only speak using your Mimicry trait.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Kobolds reach adulthood at age 6 and can live up to 120 years but rarely do so.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Kobolds are fundamentally selfish, making them evil, but their reliance on the strength of their group makes them trend toward law.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Kobolds are between 2 and 3 feet tall and weigh between 25 and 35 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg
entries: As an action on your turn, you can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of you that you can see. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Lizardfolk reach maturity around age 14 and rarely live longer than 60 years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Most lizardfolk are neutral. They see the world as a place of predators and prey, where life and death are natural processes. They wish only to survive, and prefer to leave other creatures to their own devices.

entries.name: Swim Speed
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Bite
entries: Your fanged maw is a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal piercing damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Cunning Artisan
entries: As part of a short rest, you can harvest bone and hide from a slain beast, construct, dragon, monstrosity, or plant creature of size small or larger to create one of the following items: a {@item shield|phb}, a {@item club|phb}, a {@item javelin|phb}, or {@dice 1d4} {@item dart|phb|darts} or {@item blowgun needle|phb|blowgun needles}. To use this trait, you need a blade, such as a {@item dagger|phb}, or appropriate artisan's tools, such as {@item leatherworker's tools|phb}.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries: You can hold your breath for up to 15 minutes at a time.

entries.name: Hunter's Lore
entries: You gain proficiency with two of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, {@skill Stealth}, and {@skill Survival}.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: You have tough, scaly skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

entries.name: Hungry Jaws
entries: In battle, you can throw yourself into a vicious feeding frenzy. As a bonus action, you can make a special attack with your bite. If the attack hits, it deals its normal damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1), and you can't use this trait again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Orcs reach adulthood at age 12 and live up to 50 years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Orcs are vicious raiders, who believe that the world should be theirs. They also respect strength above all else and believe the strong must bully the weak to ensure that weakness does not spread like a disease. They are usually chaotic evil.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Orcs are usually over 6 feet tall and weigh between 230 and 280 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, you can move up to your movement speed toward a hostile creature you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: You are trained in the {@skill Intimidation} skill.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Orc.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Tabaxi have lifespans equivalent to humans.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Tabaxi tend toward chaotic alignments, as they let impulse and fancy guide their decisions. They are rarely evil, with most of them driven by curiosity rather than greed or other dark impulses.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Tabaxi are taller on average than humans and relatively slender. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: You have a cat's keen senses, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Feline Agility
entries: Your reflexes and agility allow you to move with a burst of speed. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

entries.name: Cat's Claws
entries: Because of your claws, you have a climbing speed of 20 feet. In addition, your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Cat's Talents
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Perception} and {@skill Stealth} skills.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one other language of your choice.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Tritons reach maturity around age 15 and can live up to 200 years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Tritons tend toward lawful good. As guardians of the darkest reaches of the sea, their culture pushes them toward order and benevolence.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Tritons are slightly shorter than humans, averaging about 5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Swim Speed
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Control Air and Water
entries: A child of the sea, you can call on the magic of elemental air and water. You can cast {@spell fog cloud} with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast {@spell gust of wind} with it, and starting at 5th level, you can also cast {@spell wall of water|xge} with it. Once you cast a spell with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Emissary of the Sea
entries: Aquatic beasts have an extraordinary affinity with your people. You can communicate simple ideas with beasts that can breathe water. They can understand the meaning of your words, though you have no special ability to understand them in return.

entries.name: Guardians of the Depths
entries: Adapted to even the most extreme ocean depths, you have resistance to cold damage, and you ignore any of the drawbacks caused by a deep, underwater environment.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Primordial.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Purebloods mature at the same rate as humans and have lifespans similar in length to theirs.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Purebloods are devoid of emotion and see others as tools to manipulate. They care little for law or chaos and are typically neutral evil.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Purebloods match humans in average size and weight. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries: You know the {@spell poison spray} cantrip. You can cast {@spell animal friendship} an unlimited number of times with this trait, but you can target only snakes with it. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast {@spell suggestion} with this trait. Once you cast it, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Poison Immunity
entries: You are immune to poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Abyssal, and Draconic.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Changelings are built much like humans, but a little leaner. Your size is Medium

entries.name: Duplicity
entries: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Deception} skill.

entries.name: Shapechanger
entries: As an action, you can polymorph into any humanoid of your size that you have seen, or back into your true form. However, your equipment does not change with you. If you die, you revert to your natural appearance.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Warforged are generally broader and heavier than humans. Your size is Medium

entries.name: Composite Plating
entries: Your construction incorporates wood and metal, granting you a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

entries.name: Living Construct
entries: Even though you were constructed, you are a living creature. You are immune to disease. You do not need to eat or breathe, but you can ingest food and drink if you wish.

Instead of sleeping, you enter an inactive state for 4 hours each day. You do not dream in this state; you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Revenant Subrace
entries: Having met a cruel and undeserved end, you have returned to the realm of the living. As a revenant, you thirst for revenge against those who wronged you in life, or seek to complete a final, critical task you left unfinished.

The revenant subrace can be applied to any race that has a subrace, and replaces that race's existing subrace options. Alternatively, you can apply this new subrace to a race without subrace options using the modification options provided below.

Your DM might also allow you to take this subrace for a slain character. In that case, your character rises from the dead with its original subrace replaced (or with the necessary modifications made to its base traits), filled with a determination to seek vengeance or complete its mission.

entries.name: Racial Adjustments
entries: For races that don't have subrace options, taking on the revenant subrace means making changes to your character's base traits, as follows. (This playtest article provides options only for human and dragonborn characters. Any other races which do not have subrace options should not be used with these revenant subrace rules.)

entries.name: Human Revenant
entries: If you want to play a human revenant, modify the human's Ability Score Increase trait to the following: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1. If you use the variant human traits, remove the Skills trait and the Feat trait.

entries.name: Dragonborn Revenant
entries: If you want to play a dragonborn revenant, modify the dragonborn's Ability Score Increase trait to the following: Your Strength score increases by 1, and your Charisma score increases by 1. Additionally, your Draconic Ancestry trait uses necrotic damage as its damage type, replacing the damage type that applies to your breath weapon and your damage resistance.

entries.name: Tiefling Revenant
entries: A prior installment of Unearthed Arcana (That Old Black Magic) outlined two tiefling variants that make use of subraces. Use that article to make a tiefling revenant, replacing the subrace options with the revenant subrace options. The base tiefling traits from the article are as follows:

items.name: Ability Score Increase.
items.entry: Your Charisma score increases by 2.

items.name: Languages.
items.entry: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: Relentless Nature
entries: Your DM assigns a goal to you—typically, one related to your character's death. The goal must be a specific task you can complete, such as slaying an enemy or liberating an area and its people. Until you fulfill that goal, you gain the following benefits:

items: If you are below half your hit point maximum at the start of your turn, you regain 1 hit point.

If you die, you return to life 24 hours after death. If your body is destroyed, you reform within 1 mile of the place of your death at a spot determined by the DM. If your equipment was also destroyed, you do not regain it.

You know the distance and direction between you and any creature involved in your goal, such as a person you seek vengeance against or someone you pledged to defend. This awareness fails if the creature is on another plane of existence.

entries: When your goal is complete, you finally find rest. You die and cannot be restored to life.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Minotaurs enter adulthood at around the age of 17 and can live up to 150 years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Minotaurs believe in a strict code of honor, and thus tend toward law. They are loyal to the death and make implacable enemies, even as their brutal culture and disdain for weakness push them toward evil.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Minotaurs typically stand well over 6 feet tall and weigh an average of 300 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Conqueror's Virtue
entries: From a young age, you focused on one of the three virtues of strength, cunning, or intellect. Your choice of your Strength, Intelligence, or Wisdom score increases by 1.

entries.name: Horns
entries: You are never unarmed. You are proficient with your horns, which are a melee weapon that deals 1d10 piercing damage. Your horns grant you advantage on all checks made to shove a creature, but not to avoid being shoved yourself.

entries.name: Goring Rush
entries: When you use the {@action Dash} action during your turn, you can make a melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.

entries.name: Hammering Horns
entries: When you use the Attack action during your turn to make a melee attack, you can attempt to shove a creature with your horns as a bonus action. You cannot use this shove attempt to knock a creature {@condition prone}.

entries.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: You can perfectly recall any path you have traveled.

entries.name: Sea Reaver
entries: You gain proficiency with {@item navigator's tools|phb} and vehicles (water).

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Merfolk mature at the same rate humans do and reach adulthood around the age of 20. They live considerably longer than humans, though, often reaching well over 100 years.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Merfolk are about the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Swimming
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Merfolk, and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the bard spell list. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Creed of the Trickster
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Sleight of Hand} and {@skill Stealth} skills.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the druid spell list. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Wind Creed Manipulation
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Deception} and {@skill Persuasion} skills.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Water Creed Navigation
entries: You have proficiency with navigator tools and in the {@skill Survival} skill.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Goblins mature faster than humans, reaching adulthood at around age 12. They also age noticeably faster than humans, and even the most cautious goblins rarely live longer than 50 years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Most goblins are wildly chaotic, though they have no particular inclination toward good or evil.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Goblins average about 3 feet tall and weigh about 40 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Grit
entries: You have resistance to fire damage and psychic damage. In addition, when you are wearing no armor, your AC is equal to 11 + your Dexterity modifier.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: Grogtag Tamer
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Animal Handling} skill.

entries.name: Lavastep Grit
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky or subterranean environments.

entries.name: Tuktuk Cunning
entries: You have proficiency with thieves' tools.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Kor mature at the same rate as humans and live about as long.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Most kor are lawful good, with a strong dedication to community and the traditions of their ancestors.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Kor average nearly 6 feet tall, but are much lighter and more slender than humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Brave
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

entries.name: Climbing
entries: You also have a climbing speed of 30 feet as long as you are not encumbered or wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Kor Climbing
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Athletics} and {@skill Acrobatics} skills.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, and communicate in the silent speech of the Kor.

entries.name: Lucky
entries: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Vampires don't mature and age in the same way that other races do. Every living vampire is either a bloodchief, infected by Ulamog's influence in the distant reaches of history, or was spawned by a bloodchief from a living human. Most vampires are thus very old, but few have any memory of their earliest years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Vampires have no innate tendency toward evil, but consuming the life energy of other creatures often pushes them to that end. Regardless of their moral bent, the strict hierarchies of their bloodchiefs inclines them toward a lawful alignment.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Vampires are about the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Blood Thirst
entries: You can drain blood and life energy from a willing creature, or one that is {@condition grappled} by you, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. Make a melee attack against the target. If you hit, you deal 1 piercing damage and 1d6 necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and you regain hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid killed in this way becomes a null (see "Zendikar Bestiary").

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Vampire.

entries.name: Vampiric Resistance
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Aetherborn come into being as adults and live no more than a few years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: As a rule, aetherborn are driven by hedonism and self-interest, making them neutral at best

entries.name: 體型
entries: Aetherborn are about the same size as humans, ranging from 5 to 6 feet tall. They are quite light—only about 100 pounds—and their weight diminishes as they age and more and more of their substance returns to the aethersphere. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Born of Aether
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Intimidation} skill.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.

entries.name: Gift of the Aetherborn
entries: An unknown aetherborn, desperately seeking a means to extend their short life, discovered a process of transformation that prolonged their existence—by giving them the ability to feed on the life essence of other beings. Since then, other aetherborn have learned and carried out this monstrous transformation, and aetherborn with this "gift" have become a small minority among an already small population.

A gifted aetherborn has the ability to drain the life essence of other beings. Similar to the way heat is transferred from a warm object to a cold one, a gifted aetherborn need only touch another living being with a clawed hand to draw life essence out, fueling their own continued existence while draining strength and vitality from their victim.

For many aetherborn, living as they do for indulgence and instant gratification, the concepts of "want" and "need" are virtually synonymous. But Aetherborn with this gift understand what it is to truly need, for they develop a hunger for life essence that far exceeds any desires they might have felt before their transformation. A gifted aetherborn who abstains from this feeding deteriorates even more rapidly than other aetherborn, while enduring unspeakable agony caused by the deprivation of life energy.

At the DM's option, an aetherborn character can research methods of achieving this dark "gift." The process is similar to inventing and manufacturing a rare magic item (see "Inventing and Manufacturing Devices" earlier in this document). But rather than aether, the process requires a variety of rare unguents and unusual ingredients that make up the cost of researching and undergoing the transformation.

An aetherborn with this gift gains the Drain Life ability: a natural attack that deals 1d6 necrotic damage and restores the same number of hit points to the aetherborn. However, if the aetherborn goes for 7 days without dealing this damage, their hit point maximum is reduced by 1d6 per week. This reduction can't be removed until the aetherborn has used their Drain Life ability and completed a long rest.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Dwarves mature at the same rate as humans, but they're considered young until they reach the age of 50. On average, they live about 350 years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Most dwarves are lawful, believing firmly in the benefits of a well-ordered society. They tend toward good as well, with a strong sense of fair play and a belief that everyone deserves to share in the benefits of a just order.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Dwarves stand around 5 feet tall and average about 150 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your speed is not reduced by wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: Accustomed to life underground in your race's ancient past, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

entries.name: Dwarven Toughness
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

entries.name: Artisan's Expertise
entries: You gain proficiency with two kinds of artisan's tools of your choice. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies. In addition, whenever you make an Intelligence ({@skill History}) check related to the origin of any architectural construction (including buildings, public works such as canals and aqueducts, and the massive cogwork that underlies much of the construction of Ghirapur), you are considered proficient in the {@skill History} skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Dwarvish. Dwarvish is full of hard consonants and guttural sounds, and those characteristics spill over into whatever other language a dwarf might speak.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Vedalken mature at the same rate humans do, and most are expected to settle down into an adult life by around age 40. They can live 350 to almost 500 years.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Vedalken are most often lawful and rarely evil.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Vedalken are taller than humans but more slender. They average 6 to 6½ feet tall, but usually weigh less than 200 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: Vedalken Cunning
entries: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

entries.name: Aether Lore
entries: Whenever you make an Intelligence ({@skill History}) check related to magic items or aether-powered technological devices, you can add twice your proficiency bonus, instead of any proficiency bonus you normally apply.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Vedalken. The Vedalken language is renowned for its technical treatises and its catalogs of knowledge about the natural world and the aether that pervades it.

entries.name: Vedalken Dispassion
entries: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

entries.name: Tireless Precision
entries: You are proficient in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Sleight of Hand}. You are also proficient with one tool of your choice.
Whenever you make an ability check with the chosen skill or tool, roll a d4, and add the number rolled to the check's total.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Humans tend toward no particular alignment.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

entries.name: Forest Folk
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Survival} skill.

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your base walking speed is 40 feet.

entries.name: Sure-footed
entries: When you use the {@action Dash} action, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement on that turn.

entries.name: Spring Attack
entries: When you make a melee attack against a creature, you don't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of your turn, whether you hit or not.

entries.name: Breadth of Knowledge
entries: You gain proficiency in any combination of four skills or with four tools of your choice.

entries.name: Daunting
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Intimidation} skill.

entries.name: Tough
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by 2, and it increases by 2 every time you gain a level.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Aasimar mature at the same rate as humans but live a few years longer.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Due to their celestial heritage, aasimar are often good. However, some aasimar fall into evil, rejecting their heritage.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Aasimar are built like well-proportioned humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: 黑暗視覺
entries: Thanks to your celestial heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

entries.name: Celestial Resistance
entries: You have resistance to necrotic and radiant damage.

entries.name: Celestial Legacy
entries: You know the {@spell light} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell lesser restoration} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Once you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell daylight} spell once with this trait as a 3rd-level spell, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Celestial.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens. Most human initiates have completed the trials and found a glorious or inglorious death before they turn 30. Viziers can enjoy longer service to their gods, in theory living up to a century.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Humans tend toward no particular alignment. The best and the worst are found among them.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

entries.name: Skills
entries: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

entries.name: Feat
entries: You gain one feat of your choice.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: 年齡
entries: Like humans, aven reach adulthood in their late teens and can theoretically live into their 80s. Of course, most find a glorious (or inglorious) death long before that point.

entries.name: 陣營
entries: Most aven lean toward some form of neutrality. Ibis-headed aven, focused more on knowledge than any other virtue, are usually neutral. Hawk-headed aven are inclined toward lawful neutral.

entries.name: 體型
entries: Aven stand from 5 to 6 feet tall, but their bodies are slender and their bones are partially hollow to facilitate their flight. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Flight
entries: You have a flying speed of 30 feet. You can't use your flying speed while you wear medium or heavy armor. (If your campaign uses the variant rule for encumbrance, you can't use your flying speed if you are encumbered.)

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Aven.

entries.name: Kefnet's Blessing
entries: You can add half your proficiency bonus, rounded down, to any Intelligence check you make that doesn't already include your proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Hawkeyed
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Perception} skill. In addition, attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged weapon attack rolls.

entries.name: 陣營
